title: Object - Plan Security Issuance Transaction
description: Object describing securities issuance transaction from a plan by the issuer and held by a stakeholder

stock_plan_id.description: Id of StockPlan the PlanSecurities were issued from

custom_id.description: Custom Id for the PlanSecurities (e.g. O-1.)

stakeholder_id.description: Id of stakeholder that is the legal owner of the PlanSecurities

issuance_date.description: Date of issuance for the plan security

board_approval_date.description: Date of board approval for the plan security

security_law_exemptions.title: PlanSecurity - Types.SecurityExemption.schema.json Array
security_law_exemptions.description: List of security law exemptions (and applicable jurisdictions) applicable to the PlanSecurities

compensation_type.description: If the plan security is compensation, what kind?

option_grant_type.description: If the plan security is an option, what kind?

quantity.description: How many shares are subject to this plan security?

vesting.description: What vesting applies to this plan security?

expiration_date.description: Expiration date of the plan security

termination_exercise_windows.title: PlanSecurity - Types.TerminationWindow.schema.json Array
termination_exercise_windows.description: Exercise periods applicable to plan security after a termination for a given, enumerated reason
